realTimeScore: A Real-time score overlay for friendly 1vs1 and team face-offs.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to the introduction guide! Here you'll find all the basic information to get started.

setup.title: Setup for OBS
setup.content:
To properly configure OBS with our overlay, add a new source of type Browser.
Copy the URL of VersusUI (https://moreee-sa.github.io/VersusUI/#/overlay) and paste it into the URL field of the Browser source you created.
Set the resolution to 1280x200 pixels to perfectly fit the overlay layout.
To interact with the overlay, for example to write the team names, right-click on the Browser source in OBS and select Interact: a window will open where you can type or click as needed.

controlScore.title: Control the Score
controlScore.content:
To increase the score, left-click on the counter.
To decrease the score, right-click on the counter.
You can also scroll up with the mouse wheel to increase and scroll down to decrease the score.

selectPalette.title: Select a Color Palette
selectPalette.content:
You can select a color palette by pressing the keys 1 to 4 on the keyboard.
Press 0 to return to the default palette.

editNames.title: Edit Team/Player Names
editNames.content:
Click on the team name directly in the overlay.
You can write the name of the team or player, with a maximum of 30 characters.
